alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:31AM MST until March 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches, except in the Grass Range area, where 2 to 5 inches of total snow accumulation is expected. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains and Fergus County below 4500ft. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Snowy and Judith Mountains
